overview_of_class: Methods for analyzing nonlinear problems in science and engineering. Constructive approach to bifurcation theory and stability theory, dynamical response of nonlinear systems, nonlinear oscillations and phase plane analysis, nonlinear wave propagation, and perturbation methods. Applications.
name: Methods of Nonlinear Analysis
title: MEAS ES_APPM 412-0-20 Methods of Nonlinear Analysis
